contest-event.event-date:
June 27, 1903 D Broxburn Contest
Broxburn Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
broxburn-contest
None
Whinny Knowes Park, Broxburn Prizes - 1st £14, 2nd £9, 3rd £5, 4th £3, 5th £2. March contest - 1st(£1) Musselburgh and Fisherrow, 2nd(15s) Wright Memorial, 3rd(10s) Polton Mills. 6 bands competed.
June 15, 2013, 8:43 a.m. June 15, 2013, 8:57 a.m.
1 Musselburgh & Fisherrow Trades Thomas Moore L'Etoile du Nord [arr. Godfrey]
2 Polton Mills John Brown Le Domino Noir [unknown arranger]
3 Townhill Silver James Carmichael Shakespeare
4 Wright Memorial Charlie Wright Heroic
5 Glasgow Co-op Bakery W. Curtis Beethoven's Works [arr. W. Rimmer]
6 West Calder Public Band Herbert Kearsley Le Domino Noir [unknown arranger]
